gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 125, Grizzlies 110
gameRecap.excerpt: The Mavericks defeated the Grizzlies, 125-110. Luka Doncic recorded his 58th career triple double  (35 points, 12 assists, and 12 rebounds) for the Mavericks, while Tim Hardaway Jr. added 21 points and five rebounds in the victory. Jaren Jackson Jr. tallied 30 points, nine rebounds, and four assists for the Grizzlies in the losing effort. The Mavericks improve to 3-0 on the season, while the Grizzlies fall to 0-4.
